# General Checklist: Pay Conference Registration Fee Online

**Purpose**: Validate clarity, completeness, and consistency of the UC-21 requirements across scenarios, acceptance criteria, and dependencies.
**Created**: February 3, 2026
**Feature**: `specs/001-uc-21/spec.md`

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 Are login prerequisites for payment initiation explicitly defined? [Completeness, Spec §FR-001]
- [ ] CHK002 Are fee and payment-option presentation requirements specified for all registration categories? [Completeness, Spec §FR-002]
- [ ] CHK003 Are required payment record fields fully specified (amount, date/time, reference)? [Completeness, Spec §FR-004]
- [ ] CHK004 Are requirements defined for post-payment status and record visibility? [Completeness, Spec §FR-011]
- [ ] CHK005 Are requirements defined for blocking re-payment when already paid, including the required user-facing status information? [Completeness, Spec §FR-013]
- [ ] CHK006 Are requirements defined for pending-confirmation timeouts and attendee notification expectations? [Completeness, Spec §FR-014]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK007 Is “secure payment flow” defined with specific security properties or standards? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-003]
- [ ] CHK008 Is “clear error message” defined with required content or guidance for invalid/declined/unavailable cases? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-007, Spec §FR-008, Spec §FR-009]
- [ ] CHK009 Is the payment confirmation message specified with required content and placement? [Clarity, Spec §FR-006]
- [ ] CHK010 Are the exact status labels for “Paid/Confirmed” and “Pending Payment Confirmation” clearly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-005, Spec §FR-012]
- [ ] CHK011 Is the “more than 24 hours” threshold precisely defined (clock source, timezone)? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-014]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK012 Do pending-confirmation requirements align between acceptance scenarios and functional requirements? [Consistency, Spec §User Story 3, Spec §FR-012, Spec §FR-014]
- [ ] CHK013 Is duplicate confirmation handling consistent between edge cases and functional requirements? [Consistency, Spec §Edge Cases, Spec §FR-010]
- [ ] CHK014 Are registration status names consistent across the spec and data model? [Consistency, Spec §FR-005, Spec §FR-012, Data Model §Registration Status]
- [ ] CHK015 Are failure outcomes (invalid/declined/unavailable) consistent across scenarios and success criteria? [Consistency, Spec §User Story 3, Spec §SC-002]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK016 Are success criteria measurable with objective signals (status, record, message)? [Measurability, Spec §SC-001, Spec §SC-002]
- [ ] CHK017 Do success criteria cover all functional requirements, or are any FRs missing measurable outcomes? [Gap, Spec §FR-001–FR-014, Spec §SC-001–SC-004]
- [ ] CHK018 Are message-related success criteria defined with observable elements or content? [Ambiguity, Spec §SC-002]
- [ ] CHK019 Are time-based success criteria (pending >24h) defined without ambiguity? [Measurability, Spec §SC-004]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK020 Are primary flow requirements complete from initiation through confirmation? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 1]
- [ ] CHK021 Are alternate flows for already-paid registrations fully specified? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 1 Scenario 3, Spec §FR-013]
- [ ] CHK022 Are exception flows for invalid, declined, and unavailable payments fully specified? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 3]
- [ ] CHK023 Are recovery flows defined for delayed confirmation and retry guidance? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 3 Scenarios 4–5, Spec §FR-012, Spec §FR-014]
- [ ] CHK024 Are post-payment review requirements specified for later access to status and record? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 2]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK025 Is the “browser closed before confirmation is displayed” edge case explicitly addressed in requirements? [Gap, Spec §Edge Cases]
- [ ] CHK026 Is unauthenticated access behavior specified beyond login requirement (e.g., required response)? [Gap, Spec §Edge Cases, Spec §FR-001]
- [ ] CHK027 Are duplicate confirmations addressed with explicit idempotency rules and record constraints? [Coverage, Spec §FR-010, Data Model §Validation Rules]
- [ ] CHK028 Are “pending >24h” rules defined for both registration and payment transaction states? [Completeness, Spec §FR-014, Data Model §State Transitions]
- [ ] CHK029 Are retry requirements after failure or prolonged pending explicitly defined? [Gap]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK030 Are security requirements beyond “secure payment flow” specified (e.g., PCI scope, encryption, logging)? [Gap, Spec §FR-003]
- [ ] CHK031 Are accessibility requirements defined for payment and status messaging? [Gap]
- [ ] CHK032 Are performance or latency expectations for confirmation or messaging specified or explicitly excluded? [Gap, Plan §Technical Context]
- [ ] CHK033 Are audit/retention requirements for payment records specified? [Gap]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK034 Are payment service and pricing dependencies documented with required SLA/fallback expectations? [Assumption, Spec §Dependencies]
- [ ] CHK035 Are assumptions about pre-registered attendees and category selection reflected in requirements scope? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK036 Is the CMS datastore behavior for registrations/payments specified (e.g., consistency, write guarantees)? [Gap, Spec §Dependencies]
- [ ] CHK037 Are out-of-scope items (refunds, chargebacks, receipts) explicitly excluded in requirements and success criteria? [Completeness, Spec §Assumptions]

## Ambiguities & Conflicts

- [ ] CHK038 Are “payment record” and “transaction reference” defined with required format and uniqueness rules? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-004, Data Model §Payment Transaction]
- [ ] CHK039 Do any requirements conflict with data-model status constraints or transitions? [Conflict, Spec §FR-005, Spec §FR-012, Data Model §State Transitions]
- [ ] CHK040 Is the timing of “Paid/Confirmed” status relative to gateway confirmation clearly defined? [Ambiguity, Spec §FR-005, Spec §User Story 1 Scenario 2]
- [ ] CHK041 Are attendee notification requirements (who/how/when) defined for pending >24h cases? [Gap, Spec §FR-014]

## Constitution Compliance

- [ ] CHK042 Is use-case traceability to `UC-21.md` documented in the spec? [Traceability, Spec §Use Case Mapping]
- [ ] CHK043 Are acceptance tests (`UC-21-AT.md`) referenced and aligned with the spec? [Traceability, Spec §Use Case Mapping]
- [ ] CHK044 Are MVC separation constraints documented as requirements or assumptions for this feature? [Gap, Plan §Constitution Check]
- [ ] CHK045 Is the vanilla HTML/CSS/JS-only constraint explicitly stated in the requirements context? [Gap, Plan §Technical Context]

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
